00047 template< typename T > class Cap;
00048 
00065 class Cap_base
00066 {
00067 private:
00068   struct Invalid_conversion;
00069 
00070 public:
00071   enum No_init_type
00072   {
00076      No_init
00077   };
00078 
00082   enum Cap_type
00083   {
00084     Invalid = L4_INVALID_CAP 
00085   };
00086 
00091   l4_cap_idx_t cap() const throw() { return _c; }
00092 
00099   bool is_valid() const throw() { return !(_c & L4_INVALID_CAP_BIT); }
00100 
00101   operator Invalid_conversion * () const throw()
00102   { return (Invalid_conversion*)(!(_c & L4_INVALID_CAP_BIT)); }
00103 
00109   l4_fpage_t fpage(unsigned rights = L4_FPAGE_RWX) const throw()
00110   { return l4_obj_fpage(_c, 0, rights); }
00111 
00118   l4_umword_t snd_base(unsigned grant = 0,
00119                        l4_cap_idx_t base = L4_INVALID_CAP) const throw()
00120   {
00121     if (base == L4_INVALID_CAP)
00122       base = _c;
00123     return l4_map_obj_control(base, grant);
00124   }
00125 
00126 
00130   bool operator == (Cap_base const &o) const throw()
00131   { return _c == o._c; }
00132 
00136   bool operator != (Cap_base const &o) const throw()
00137   { return _c != o._c; }
00138 
00145   inline l4_msgtag_t validate(l4_utcb_t *u = l4_utcb()) const throw();
00146 
00155   inline l4_msgtag_t validate(Cap<Task> task,
00156                               l4_utcb_t *u = l4_utcb()) const throw();
00157 
00161   void invalidate() throw() { _c = L4_INVALID_CAP; }
00162 protected:
00167   explicit Cap_base(l4_cap_idx_t c) throw() : _c(c) {}
00171   explicit Cap_base(Cap_type cap) throw() : _c(cap) {}
00172 
00177   explicit Cap_base(l4_default_caps_t cap) throw() : _c(cap) {}
00178 
00182   explicit Cap_base() throw() {}
00183 
00186   l4_cap_idx_t _c;
00187 };
00188 
00189 
00198 template< typename T >
00199 class Cap : public Cap_base
00200 {
00201 private:
00202   friend class L4::Kobject;
00203 
00214   explicit Cap(T const *p) throw()
00215   : Cap_base(reinterpret_cast<l4_cap_idx_t>(p)) {}
00216 
00217 public:
00218 
00223   template< typename O >
00224   Cap(Cap<O> const &o) throw() : Cap_base(o.cap())
00225   { register T* __t = ((O*)100); (void)__t; }
00226 
00230   Cap(Cap_type cap) throw() : Cap_base(cap) {}
00231 
00236   Cap(l4_default_caps_t cap) throw() : Cap_base(cap) {}
00237 
00242   explicit Cap(l4_cap_idx_t idx = L4_INVALID_CAP) throw() : Cap_base(idx) {}
00243 
00247   explicit Cap(No_init_type) throw() {}
00248 
00255   Cap move(Cap const &src) const
00256   {
00257     if (!is_valid() || !src.is_valid())
00258       return *this;
00259 
00260     l4_task_map(L4_BASE_TASK_CAP, L4_BASE_TASK_CAP, src.fpage(L4_FPAGE_RWX),
00261                 snd_base(L4_MAP_ITEM_GRANT));
00262 
00263     return *this;
00264   }
00265 
00269   T *operator -> () const throw() { return reinterpret_cast<T*>(_c); }
00270 };
00271 
00272 
00277 template<>
00278 class Cap<void> : public Cap_base
00279 {
00280 public:
00281 
00282   explicit Cap(void const *p) throw()
00283   : Cap_base(reinterpret_cast<l4_cap_idx_t>(p)) {}
00284 
00288   Cap(Cap_type cap) throw() : Cap_base(cap) {}
00289 
00294   Cap(l4_default_caps_t cap) throw() : Cap_base(cap) {}
00295 
00300   explicit Cap(l4_cap_idx_t idx = L4_INVALID_CAP) throw() : Cap_base(idx) {}
00301   explicit Cap(No_init_type) throw() {}
00302 
00309   Cap move(Cap const &src) const
00310   {
00311     if (!is_valid() || !src.is_valid())
00312       return *this;
00313 
00314     l4_task_map(L4_BASE_TASK_CAP, L4_BASE_TASK_CAP, src.fpage(L4_FPAGE_RWX),
00315                 snd_base(L4_MAP_ITEM_GRANT));
00316 
00317     return *this;
00318   }
00319 
00320   template< typename T >
00321   Cap(Cap<T> const &o) throw() : Cap_base(o.cap()) {}
00322 };
00323 
00341 template< typename T, typename F >
00342 inline
00343 Cap<T> cap_cast(Cap<F> const &c) throw()
00344 {
00345   (void)static_cast<T const *>(reinterpret_cast<F const *>(100));
00346   return Cap<T>(c.cap());
00347 }
00348 
00365 template< typename T, typename F >
00366 inline
00367 Cap<T> cap_reinterpret_cast(Cap<F> const &c) throw()
00368 {
00369   return Cap<T>(c.cap());
00370 }
00371 
00396 #define L4_DISABLE_COPY(_class)         \
00397   private:                              \
00398     _class(_class const &);             \
00399     _class operator = (_class const &);
00400 
00401 
00415 #define L4_KOBJECT_DISABLE_COPY(_class) \
00416   protected:                            \
00417     _class();                           \
00418   L4_DISABLE_COPY(_class)
00419 
00420 
00437 #define L4_KOBJECT(_class) L4_KOBJECT_DISABLE_COPY(_class)
00438 
00439 
00451 class Kobject
00452 {
00453   L4_KOBJECT(Kobject)
00454 
00455 private:
00456 
00457   template<typename T>
00458   friend Type_info const *kobject_typeid();
00459 
00460 protected:
00468   struct __Kobject_typeid { static Type_info const _m; };
00469 
00477   l4_cap_idx_t cap() const throw() { return _c(); }
00478 
00479 private:
00480 
00485   l4_cap_idx_t _c() const throw()
00486   { return reinterpret_cast<l4_cap_idx_t>(this) & L4_CAP_MASK; }
00487 
00488 public:
00502   l4_msgtag_t dec_refcnt(l4_mword_t diff, l4_utcb_t *utcb = l4_utcb())
00503   { return l4_kobject_dec_refcnt_u(cap(), diff, utcb); }
00504 };
00505 
00508 inline l4_msgtag_t
00509 Cap_base::validate(Cap<Task> task, l4_utcb_t *u) const throw()
00510 { return l4_task_cap_valid_u(task.cap(), _c, u);  }
00511 
00512 inline l4_msgtag_t
00513 Cap_base::validate(l4_utcb_t *u) const throw()
00514 { return l4_task_cap_valid_u(L4_BASE_TASK_CAP, _c, u);  }
00515 
00516 }; // namespace L4

00518 #include <l4/sys/meta>

00520 namespace L4 {
00521 
00545 template< typename T, typename F >
00546 inline
00547 Cap<T> cap_dynamic_cast(Cap<F> const &c) throw()
00548 {
00549   if (!c.is_valid())
00550     return Cap<T>::Invalid;
00551 
00552   Cap<Meta> mc = cap_reinterpret_cast<Meta>(c);
00553   Type_info const *m = kobject_typeid<T>();
00554   if (m->proto() && l4_error(mc->supports(m->proto())) > 0)
00555     return Cap<T>(c.cap());
00556 
00557   // FIXME: use generic checker
00558 #if 0
00559   if (l4_error(mc->supports(T::kobject_proto())) > 0)
00560     return Cap<T>(c.cap());
00561 #endif
00562 
00563   return Cap<T>::Invalid;
00564 }
00565 
00567 }
